overview: Set in a speakeasy in Atlanta, “Twenty” is a feature documentary about fifteen young people making it through 2020.  The film is an observational time capsule that lays bare the raw reflections of a group of people surviving a year that will be seared into our generational memory.
tagline: Within a secret speakeasy, fifteen young people talk, sing, dance - and drink - briefly hidden from the chaos of the outside world.
title: Twenty
